question_text: What year did World War II begin?
Who was the first president of the United States?
In which year was the American Declaration of Independence signed?
What event marked the end of World War I?
options: The signing of the Treaty of Versailles
The assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand
answer: The signing of the Treaty of Versailles

question_text: Which of the following is considered one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World?
What was the cause of the French Revolution?
options: The end of the Cold War

question_text: What was the outcome of the Battle of Waterloo?
options: Napoleon Bonaparte was defeated and exiled to St. Helena
Napoleon Bonaparte won and continued his reign as emperor of France
Napoleon Bonaparte abdicated the throne and retired to Corsica
answer: Napoleon Bonaparte was defeated and exiled to St. Helena

question_text: Which of the following was a major cause of World War II?
options: The fall of the Soviet Union
The rise of fascism in Europe
The defeat of Germany in World War I
answer: The rise of fascism in Europe
